ygData.subject: RE: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nonono.. I wasn t calling you holier than thou, I was speaking of the sarcastic people on the server that insist upon giving newbies a hard time even for
ygData.messageBody:
> If so, then I apologize. I'm just growing weary of
> sarcasm as of late. Newbies asking questions on the
> server that a simple yes or no question would answer
> and all they're getting are long drawn out cut-downs
> from "holier than thou" types. Drives me nuts.
>
> hrm, holier than thou? yeesh...

Nonono.. I wasn't calling you holier than thou, I was
speaking of the sarcastic people on the server that
insist upon giving newbies a hard time even for the
not-so-obvious questions.
